summary: Helps you find the best places to meet up with friends using a mid-point algorithm. Simply enter your locations and hit submit.
Similar to the previous concept, Meetup Point helps you find the best places to meet up with friends using a distance matrix algorithm based on transport routes.

Web form system built for the Pakistani Consulate. Applicants can fill and submit forms which are administrated by different tiers of administration. Includes support for file upload & mobile responsive
Easy to maintain portfolio, I only need to update a JSON file which is conditionally rendered by React.
